charges.charge_description: 7:2024 TRANSFER OR UNAUTHORIZED USE OF FOOD STAMPS, did knowingly and unlawfully transfer an access device with a value less than $100 (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby placed on probation for a term of 2 years, comply with standard conditions adopted by this court and the following additional conditions: 1) The defendant shall participate in a substance abuse program for alcohol and/or drug testing and treatment as directed by the probation officer, until such time as defendant is released from the program by the probation officer. 2) Defenant shall pay $60 restitution at a monthly rate of no less than $10 through the U.S. Clerk of Court's Office to be forwarded to U.S. Secret Service, Financial Management Division, 1800 G St., N.W., Accounts Receivable, Room 768, Washington, D.C. 20223, Attention: Terry Coles. $25.00 Special Assessment. The Court finds the defendant paid a $50 special assessment fee on 12/10/97, and a refund of $25 is due from the office of the Clerk of Court. It is ordered that the $25 overpayment be applied towards the defendant's restitution. The balance of the restitution shall be paid as previously stated. (1)
